title: Traditional knish
ingredients: ['7 large potatoes, peeled and cubed', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', 'For the pastry', '2 eggs', '120ml vegetable oil', '235ml warm water', '1 teaspoon salt', '500g plain flour', '2 egg yolks', '2 tablespoons milk']
